广义函数的卷积

广义函数作为上的泛函，即，则对任意$\varphi\in C_{0}{\infty}(R{n})\langle u,\varphi\rangleu_{1},u_{2}\in \mathcal{D}’(R^{n}),\forall \varphi\in C_{0}{\infty}(R{n})\langle u_{1},\varphi\rangle=\langle u_{2},\varphi \rangleu_{1}=u_{2}u_{1}=u_{2}$的另一种条件

由于，故若$\forall \varphi\in C_{0}{\infty}(R{n})u_{1}\ast \varphi=u_{2}\ast\varphiu_{1}=u_{2}$

广义函数卷积的性质

  • 卷积运算关于每个因子是线性的

  • 对任意其支集包含在的余集中的，它满足，于是有

    因此，在的余集上为零，所以

    即，再由广义函数卷积的对称性，得

  • 对于任意，应用广义函数微商的定义可得

    $$
    \begin{align*}
    \langle \partial^{\alpha}(f\ast g),\varphi\rangle&=(-1)^{\left|\alpha\right|}\langle f\ast g,\partial^{\alpha}\varphi\rangle\
    &=(-1)^{\left|\alpha\right|}\langle f(x),\langle g(y),\partial^{\alpha}\varphi(x+y)\rangle\
    &=(-1)^{\left|\alpha_{1}\right|}\langle f(x),(-1)^{\left|\alpha_{2}\right|}\langle g(y),\partial_{x}{\alpha_{1}}\partial_{y}{\alpha_{2}}\varphi(x+y)\rangle\rangle\
    &=(-1)^{\left|\alpha_{1}\right|}\langle f(x),\langle \partial{\alpha_{2}}g(y),\partial_{x}{\alpha_{1}}\varphi(x+y)\rangle\rangle\
    &=(-1)^{\left|\alpha_{1}\right|}\langle f(x),\partial_{x}^{\alpha_{1}}\langle \partial^{\alpha_{2}}g(y),\varphi(x+y)\rangle\rangle\
    &=\langle \partial^{\alpha_{1}}f(x),\langle \partial^{\alpha_{2}}g(y),\varphi(x+y)\rangle\rangle\
    &=\langle(\partial{\alpha_{1}}f)\ast(\partial{\alpha_{2}}g),\varphi\rangle
    \end{align*}
    $$

上述卷积运算的结合律、交换律及使得广义函数在卷积运算下成为一个有单位元的代数，其单位元为函数，称其为卷积代数\
有了上述卷积运算的结合律及交换律，则可定义任意个广义函数的卷积，只要它们中至少有个是紧支集的即可，即
